title: Views Downstream from Mid-River: (1) to Bingen and Rüdesheim (Sketch of Rüdesheim to Right); (2) to St Roch’s Chapel, Bingen and Rüdesheim; (3) to Burg Klopp, Bingen, the Maüseturm and Burg Ehrenfels; (4) to the Church at Bornhofen and ‘The Brothers’
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
